attributes.action: Create a new bank holiday - "National Fat Cat Day"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time to put the fun back into government! Time to put the 'crass' back into democracy!

This is a petition to solve a national scandal:


THE ISSUE

HBOS and RBOS failed.

The nation now owns a majority shareholding in these companies. 

Those responsible for cataclysmic failure have been rewarded with huge annual pensions.

There is no way of recouping these pensions without breaching contracts and thus undermining the rule of law. 

It's unjust and immoral but there is nothing that can be done.
 
Or maybe there is...


A JOYOUS SOLUTION

The Government declares a New Bank Holiday: "The National Fat Cat Day".

Yes, one day a year when Sir Fred and his ilk come to Wembley Stadium to collect their pension entitlements in cash and we, the Great British Public, have a day off to vent our spleens and shower them in rotten eggs. 



THE PETITION

If you are in favour, place your name below mine and send it on:

1. J Nimmo

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
